attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Manslaughter currently carries a maximum sentence of 7 years however most people convicted only receive a 5 year sentence, crimes such as burglary and assault carry an equal or in some cases longer sentence.Serious crimes like manslaughter needs to be reviewed so that the sentence reflects the crime committed I would like the Government to see sense and make the penalty for manslaughter a minimum of 10 years!It currently stands at between 2 and 7 years even for the manslaughter of children!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
